alert.note: Alert for North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 21 at 3:24AM MST until January 21 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST TODAY... * WHAT...Snow ongoing. Additional snow accumulations up to two inches. * WHERE...Limon. * WHEN...Until Noon MST today. * IMPACTS...Roads will likely become slick and hazardous. Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org. Roads will be slick resulting in slow and hazardous travel. Allow extra time to reach your destination.

area.areaDesc: North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County
